English.Text: What should I be?! Say it! What is it this time? Should I hang lower in the sky? Should I turn with you? If I ever make it into the game without one person complaining Iâ€™ll eat my hat. Come on then you bright sparks, gift me an entry in the options menu, this wheelie-bin for half-finished features. Or even better! How about a day-night cycle, huh? Then every five minutes I can cede my throne to a rotten cheese!
